segments.text: This whole scene makes me incredibly nervous, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is just so unstable, poised to tip at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself on the hard kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, walking around in that growing puddle, is a major slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating that she's so oblivious to all these dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she notice the sound of the running water, or feel the wet floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of broken dishes and an injured child is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that one plate is almost maddening given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence could lead to some serious consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out and warn everyone in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for accidents here is very high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to watch without feeling a pang of fear.
segments.speaker: PAR
